supplier_of: import-export - food and agriculture | croquetas | tapas | pulled pork | pulled meats
information: a Spanish food manufacturing company called Your Tapas Company (Yatecomere in Spanish). We specialise in providing the catering industry in Spain (Taperias, hotels, hospitals, cafes, Michelin starred restaurants, catering groups and distributors) with ready or part cooked Tapas products, including different flavoured frozen artisan style Croquetas (Iberican ham, Iberican ham and wild mushroom, cuttlefish in their ink, cheese and spinach, octopus- all made with a béchamel filling rather than potato), Potato mixture for Spanish Omelettes, Meat & fish dishes including baby suckling pig (Cochinillo) and sauces. Our products come in a range of different formats across the chilled and frozen ranges. We also have a line of products/ ready meals which we sell through our retail sector of the company in Spanish Supermarkets.
address: Polígono industrial de Cabanelas . Rúa do pan, 8 36636 (Pontevedra)
keywords: Import-export - food and agriculture, Croquetas, Tapas, pulled pork, Pulled Meats
